importantArticles.headline: AGNC Investment Corp. (Nasdaq: AGNC) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a cash dividend of $0.12 per share of common stock for April 2025. The dividend is payable on May 9, 2025 to common stockholders of record as of April 30, 2025.
importantArticles.title: AGNC Investment Corp. Declares Monthly Common Stock Dividend of $0.12 per Common Share for April 2025

importantArticles.headline: AGNC Investment (NasdaqGS:AGNC) recently declared a $0.12 per share dividend, with preferred dividends also announced, highlighting their commitment to shareholder payouts. Despite this, the company's stock saw a price decline of 8%, aligning with a broader market downturn where the Dow Jones fell amidst tariff uncertainties. The firm’s earnings announcement and lack of buyback activity likely contributed little to counter the prevailing market forces. While the broader market was impacted by...
importantArticles.title: AGNC Investment (NasdaqGS:AGNC) Declares US$0.12 Dividend Despite 8% Price Dip Over Last Quarter

importantArticles.headline: AGNC Investment Corp. (Nasdaq: AGNC) ("AGNC" or the "Company") announced today it will report first quarter 2025 earnings after market close on April 21, 2025. AGNC will hold a stockholder call and audio webcast on April 22, 2025 at 8:30 am ET. Callers who do not plan on asking a question and have internet access are encouraged to utilize the webcast at www.AGNC.com. Those who plan on participating in the Q&A or do not have internet available may access the call by dialing (877) 300-5922 (U.S. d
importantArticles.title: AGNC Investment Corp. Announces Date for First Quarter Earnings Release and Stockholder Call
